languages.text: В островных районах, не представляющих интереса и покрытых густыми лесами, располагались тренировочные лагеря мятежников. К тому же именно там, по мнению разведки, скрывались инициаторы мятежа — враги Человечества, {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносы{/g}. Губернатор Вьятт предложила искоренить не имеющие ценности леса, скрывающие повстанцев, однако имелись серьезные сомнения в компетентности выделенных ей специалистов. Обнаружение же лагерей силами корабельной техники благословенно{mf|го|й} Лорд-капитана было серьезной задачей, посильной лишь очень зоркому и могущественному авгуру.

traits.locale_text: В островных районах, не представляющих интереса и покрытых густыми лесами, располагались тренировочные лагеря мятежников. К тому же, именно там, по мнению разведки, скрывались инициаторы мятежа — враги человечества, ксеносы. Губернатор Вьятт предложила искоренить не имеющие ценности леса, скрывающие повстанцев, однако имелись серьезные сомнения в компетентности выделенных ей специалистов. Обнаружение же лагерей силами корабельной техники благословенно{mf|го|й} Лорд-капитана было серьезной задачей, посильной лишь очень зоркому и могущественному авгуру.

languages.text: The rebels' training camps were located in the densely forested but insignificant island regions. Moreover, scouting reports indicated that the instigators of the uprising were also hiding there — {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, the enemies of Humanity. Governor Vyatt suggested burning the worthless forests to the ground so the rebels could no longer hide, however, there were serious doubts about the competence of the officers she selected for the task. Locating the camps using the blessed Lord Captain's ship's technical equipment was a real challenge possible only for a highly sensitive and powerful augur.

Governor Vyatt suggested burning the worthless forests to the ground so the rebels could no longer hide, however, there were serious doubts about the competence of the officers she selected for the task. Locating the camps using the blessed Lord Captain's ship's technical equipment was a real challenge possible only for a highly sensitive and powerful auger.

The rebels' training camps were located in the densely forested but insignificant island regions. Moreover, scouting reports indicated that the instigators of the uprising were also hiding there — {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, the enemies of Humanity. Governor Vyatt suggested burning the worthless forests to the ground so the rebels could no longer hide, however, there were serious doubts about the competence of the officers she selected for the task. Locating the camps using the blessed Lord Captain's ship's technical equipment was a real challenge possible only for a highly sensitive and powerful augur.

languages.text: 反逆者の訓練キャンプは深い森の中に位置しているとはいえ、取るに足らない離島地域だ。さらに、斥候の報告によればこの暴動の扇動者である{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}、すなわち人類の敵もそこに潜んでいるという。ビャット総督は経済的価値のない森を焼いて更地にすれば反逆者の隠れ場所はなくなると提案した。しかしながら、総督が選んだ将校にこの任務を遂行する能力があるかは、極めて疑わしかった。祝福されしロード・キャプテンの船の技術機器を使用しキャンプの位置を特定することは、非常に敏感で強力なオーガーでのみ可能な真の挑戦だった。
languages.original_text: The rebels' training camps were located in the densely forested but insignificant island regions. Moreover, scouting reports indicated that the instigators of the uprising were also hiding there — {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, the enemies of Humanity. Governor Vyatt suggested burning the worthless forests to the ground so the rebels could no longer hide, however, there were serious doubts about the competence of the officers she selected for the task. Locating the camps using the blessed Lord Captain's ship's technical equipment was a real challenge possible only for a highly sensitive and powerful augur.

traits.locale_text: 反逆者の訓練キャンプは深い森の中に位置しているとはいえ、取るに足らない離島地域だ。さらに、斥候の報告によればこの暴動の扇動者である{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}、すなわち人類の敵もそこに潜んでいるという。ビャット総督は経済的価値のない森を焼いて更地にすれば反逆者の隠れ場所はなくなると提案した。しかしながら、総督が選んだ将校にこの任務を遂行する能力があるかは、極めて疑わしかった。祝福されしロード・キャプテンの船の技術機器を使用しキャンプの位置を特定することは、非常に敏感で強力なオーガーでのみ可能な真の挑戦だった。

languages.text: 叛军的训练营地位于无足轻重的岛屿地区，那里森林茂密。此外，侦察报告显示，这场叛乱的煽动者也藏匿在那里。叛军的领袖是人类之敌——{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}。维亚特总督建议烧毁这些毫无价值的森林，让叛军无处藏身，但她挑出来的军官是否能胜任这项任务，却是件相当存疑的事情。如果想用舰长大人飞船上的技术设备来确认营地的位置，恐怕会是件相当困难的事情，只有极其强大、感应灵敏的俄歇矩阵才能做到这点。
languages.original_text: The rebels' training camps were located in the densely forested but insignificant island regions. Moreover, scouting reports indicated that the instigators of the uprising were also hiding there — {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, the enemies of Humanity. Governor Vyatt suggested burning the worthless forests to the ground so the rebels could no longer hide, however, there were serious doubts about the competence of the officers she selected for the task. Locating the camps using the blessed Lord Captain's ship's technical equipment was a real challenge possible only for a highly sensitive and powerful augur.

traits.locale_text: 叛军的训练营地位于无足轻重的岛屿地区，那里森林茂密。此外，侦察报告显示，这场叛乱的煽动者也藏匿在那里。叛军的领袖是人类之敌——{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}。维亚特总督建议烧毁这些毫无价值的森林，让叛军无处藏身，但她挑出来的军官是否能胜任这项任务，却是件相当存疑的事情。如果想用舰长大人飞船上的技术设备来确认营地的位置，恐怕会是件相当困难的事情，只有极其强大、感应灵敏的俄歇矩阵才能做到这点。

languages.text: Los campos de entrenamiento de los rebeldes fueron localizados en las boscosas (aunque insignificantes) regiones insulares. Además, los informes de los exploradores revelaron que los instigadores de la sublevación se ocultaban también allí; {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, los enemigos de la Humanidad. La gobernadora Vyatt sugirió incendiar los bosques para que los rebeldes no tuvieran dónde esconderse, pero hubo serias dudas sobre la competencia de los agentes que designó para la tarea. Encontrar los campos usando la tecnología de la nave {mf|del bendito Lord Capitán|de la bendita Lord Capitán} supuso un verdadero desafío que sólo estuvo al alcance de un augur sumamente poderoso y perceptivo.
languages.original_text: The rebels' training camps were located in the densely forested but insignificant island regions. Moreover, scouting reports indicated that the instigators of the uprising were also hiding there — {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, the enemies of Humanity. Governor Vyatt suggested burning the worthless forests to the ground so the rebels could no longer hide, however, there were serious doubts about the competence of the officers she selected for the task. Locating the camps using the blessed Lord Captain's ship's technical equipment was a real challenge possible only for a highly sensitive and powerful augur.

traits.locale_text: Los campos de entrenamiento de los rebeldes fueron localizados en las boscosas (aunque insignificantes) regiones insulares. Además, los informes de los exploradores revelaron que los instigadores de la sublevación se ocultaban también allí; {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, los enemigos de la Humanidad. La gobernadora Vyatt sugirió incendiar los bosques para que los rebeldes no tuvieran dónde esconderse, pero hubo serias dudas sobre la competencia de los agentes que designó para la tarea. Encontrar los campos usando la tecnología de la nave {mf|del bendito Lord Capitán|de la bendita Lord Capitán} supuso un verdadero desafío que sólo estuvo al alcance de un augur sumamente poderoso y perceptivo.

languages.text: Die Ausbildungslager der Rebellen befanden sich in den dicht bewaldeten, aber unbedeutenden Inselregionen. Außerdem berichteten Späher, dass die Urheber des Aufstands sich ebenfalls dort versteckten – {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}, die Feinde der Menschheit. Gouverneurin Vyatt schlug vor, die wertlosen Wälder niederzubrennen, damit die Rebellen sich nicht mehr verstecken konnten, aber es bestanden ernste Zweifel an der Kompetenz der Offiziere, die sie für diese Aufgabe auswählte. Die Lager mit Hilfe der technischen Ausstattung des Schiffs des gesegneten Lord Captain zu finden, war eine echte Herausforderung, die nur ein hochgradig sensibler und mächtiger Augur meistern konnte.
languages.original_text: The rebels' training camps were located in the densely forested but insignificant island regions. Moreover, scouting reports indicated that the instigators of the uprising were also hiding there — {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, the enemies of Humanity. Governor Vyatt suggested burning the worthless forests to the ground so the rebels could no longer hide, however, there were serious doubts about the competence of the officers she selected for the task. Locating the camps using the blessed Lord Captain's ship's technical equipment was a real challenge possible only for a highly sensitive and powerful augur.

traits.locale_text: Die Ausbildungslager der Rebellen befanden sich in den dicht bewaldeten, aber unbedeutenden Inselregionen. Außerdem berichteten Späher, dass die Urheber des Aufstands sich ebenfalls dort versteckten – {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}, die Feinde der Menschheit. Gouverneurin Vyatt schlug vor, die wertlosen Wälder niederzubrennen, damit die Rebellen sich nicht mehr verstecken konnten, aber es bestanden ernste Zweifel an der Kompetenz der Offiziere, die sie für diese Aufgabe auswählte. Die Lager mit Hilfe der technischen Ausstattung des Schiffs des gesegneten Lord Captain zu finden, war eine echte Herausforderung, die nur ein hochgradig sensibler und mächtiger Augur meistern konnte.

languages.text: Les camps d'entraînement des rebelles se trouvaient dans des îles densément boisées, mais sans grand intérêt. D'après les rapports des éclaireurs, c'est également là que se cachaient les instigateurs de la révolte : des {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g}, les ennemis de l'humanité. La gouverneure Vyatt suggéra de réduire ces forêts inutiles en cendres pour que les dissidents ne puissent plus s'y cacher, mais de sérieux doutes subsistaient quant aux compétences des officiers qu'elle avait choisis pour cette mission. Les camps furent localisés depuis le vaisseau {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, une tâche difficile qui ne put être accomplie que grâce à un scrutateur extrêmement puissant.
languages.original_text: The rebels' training camps were located in the densely forested but insignificant island regions. Moreover, scouting reports indicated that the instigators of the uprising were also hiding there — {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, the enemies of Humanity. Governor Vyatt suggested burning the worthless forests to the ground so the rebels could no longer hide, however, there were serious doubts about the competence of the officers she selected for the task. Locating the camps using the blessed Lord Captain's ship's technical equipment was a real challenge possible only for a highly sensitive and powerful augur.

traits.locale_text: Les camps d'entraînement des rebelles se trouvaient dans des îles densément boisées, mais sans grand intérêt. D'après les rapports des éclaireurs, c'est également là que se cachaient les instigateurs de la révolte : des {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g}, les ennemis de l'humanité. La gouverneure Vyatt suggéra de réduire ces forêts inutiles en cendres pour que les dissidents ne puissent plus s'y cacher, mais de sérieux doutes subsistaient quant aux compétences des officiers qu'elle avait choisis pour cette mission. Les camps furent localisés depuis le vaisseau {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, une tâche difficile qui ne put être accomplie que grâce à un scrutateur extrêmement puissant.

languages.text: İsyancıların eğitim kampları, adaların en sık ormanlık ancak önemsiz bölgelerinde konuşlanmıştı. Ayrıca keşif erlerinin raporlarına göre ayaklanmayı başlatan şahıslar, yani İnsanlık düşmanı {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}zenolar{/g} da oralarda saklanıyordu. Vali Vyatt, isyancıların saklanamaması için bu gereksiz ormanları yakıp kül etmeyi teklif etti. Ancak bu görev için seçtiği subayların yetkinliği hususunda şüpheler mevcuttu. Yüce Lord Kaptan'ın gemisinin teknik ekipmanını kullanarak kampların yerinin tespiti, yalnızca çok hassas ve kudretli alametlerin başarabileceği zorlu bir görevdi.
languages.original_text: The rebels' training camps were located in the densely forested but insignificant island regions. Moreover, scouting reports indicated that the instigators of the uprising were also hiding there — {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, the enemies of Humanity. Governor Vyatt suggested burning the worthless forests to the ground so the rebels could no longer hide, however, there were serious doubts about the competence of the officers she selected for the task. Locating the camps using the blessed Lord Captain's ship's technical equipment was a real challenge possible only for a highly sensitive and powerful augur.

Vali Vyatt, isyancıların saklanamaması için bu gereksiz ormanları yakıp kül etmeyi teklif etti. Ancak bu görev için seçtiği subayların yetkinliği hususunda şüpheler mevcuttu. Yüce Lord Kaptan'ın gemisinin teknik ekipmanını kullanarak kampların yerinin tespiti, yalnızca çok hassas ve kudretli alametlerin başarabileceği zorlu bir görevdi.
